org.pojava.datetime
Interface IDateTimeConfig

All Known Implementing Classes:
DateTimeConfig
public interface IDateTimeConfig

This interface defines methods essential for global configuration of the DateTime object.

Author:
John Pile

Method Detail

isDmyOrder

boolean isDmyOrder()
British DD/MM/YYYY vs. Western MM/DD/YYYY

Returns:
True if parser interprets DD/MM/YYYY vs MM/DD/YYYY.

getTzMap

java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getTzMap()
Map of timezones and their offsets. You can customize the default map to add your own timezones by referencing other timezones.

Returns:
TimeZones.

getSupportedLanguages

java.lang.Object[] getSupportedLanguages()
Language support for interpreting names of months.

Returns:
Array of supported language refs.
